title: [client]Leaver ques resetting
body: When doing my leaver games the time till i actually start searching for a game gets reset, in the link i had a 10 minute leaver and  but the time till i was allowed to accept a match kept resetting after 3 minutes. i was in this que for an hour and still hadnt found a match. this is really annoying as i wanna quickly get my leavers over with but now its going to take forever. please provide a fix for this as this also happended to my friend kaiser123 when he had a leaver

replies.body: It sounds like you could be losing sync.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can check this out and and help with your specific issue.
